name: Ceres 42
description:
WARNING: Please read at first whenever you hit an asteroid Michael Jackson's beat it starts playing. Just thought you would like to know so you don't get spooked and scared. Also if you want that taken out let me know and Ill see.

Ceres 42 is based of the original asteroids game which launched in 1984. The differences in this game are.

Differences:

-There is a space background to the game which has the Moon and Saturn in it.

-It shows and tells you what your score is and how much lives you have.

-It also has an invincibility feature for two seconds whenever you die and when you start the game.

-Also if you have any ideas for what to change or take out send me a email about it and well see.
